import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { BiHome, BiGridAlt, BiCollection, BiBookAlt, BiPieChartAlt2, BiLineChart, BiPlug, BiCompass, BiHistory, BiCog, BiMenu } from 'react-icons/bi'; function Sidebar() { useEffect(() => { const arrowElements = document.querySelectorAll(".arrow"); for (let i = 0; i < arrowElements.length; i++) { arrowElements[i].addEventListener("click", (e) => { let arrowParent = e.target.parentElement.parentElement; arrowParent.classList.toggle("showMenu"); }); } const sidebarBtn = document.querySelector(".bx-menu"); const sidebar = document.querySelector(".sidebar"); console.log(sidebarBtn); sidebarBtn.addEventListener("click", () => { sidebar.classList.toggle("close"); }); // Clean up the event listeners when the component is unmounted return () => { for (let i = 0; i < arrowElements.length; i++) { arrowElements[i].removeEventListener("click", (e) => { let arrowParent = e.target.parentElement.parentElement; arrowParent.classList.toggle("showMenu"); }); } sidebarBtn.removeEventListener("click", () => { sidebar.classList.toggle("close"); }); }; }, []); return (
